text: The Van Bosse–Fock cabinet was the cabinet of the Netherlands from 4 June 1868 until 4 January 1871. The cabinet was formed by Independent Liberals (Ind. Lib.). The Centre-right cabinet was a minority government in the House of Representatives. Independent Liberal Pieter Philip van Bosse was Prime Minister. ==Cabinet members== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Ministers !colspan=2|Title/Ministry !Term of office
